name: Goo Grab
description:
Do you have what it takes to GRAB THE GOO??

BLAST Deeper and Deeper through randomly generated levels

Try to stay alive

Collect the container of evil techno goo, and make it back in one piece!

Ludum Dare 48 Entry - Blast Deeper and deeper through randomly generated levels trying to stay alive and make it back out again.

Features:

Shotgun Jumping
Double Jumping
Laser......Bridges......
AND GOOOOOOOOO!

Ludum Dare Submission
